item.title: CVE-2022-40739|2024-09-17T00:17:32.560Z -- ragic%2C%20inc. -- ragic
item.description: Ragic report generation page has insufficient filtering for special characters. A remote attacker with general user privilege can inject JavaScript to perform XSS (Reflected Cross-Site Scripting) attack.
